title: GAMING СЛУШАЛКИ HYPERX CLOUD III - GAMING HEADSET WIRED
description:
Impedance: 64Ω
Ear cushions Memory foam and premium leatherette
Polar Pattern: Uni-directional, Noise-cancelling
Audio Connection: Wired 3.5mm (4-pole CTIA), Wired USB
Audio Controls: Onboard audio controls
Sensitivity (microphone): -42dBV (0dB=1V/Pa at 1kHz)
Sensitivity (headphone): 100dBSPL/mW at 1kHz
Element: Electret condenser microphone
Driver: Dynamic, 53mm with Neodymium magnets
Weight: 308g; Weight with microphone: 320g
Hardware compatibility: PC, PS5™, PS4™, Xbox Series X|S™, Xbox One™, Nintendo Switch™, Mac®, Mobile.
